typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		OrderDate as string,
		DueDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		Status as short,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		CustomerID as short,
		SalesPersonID as short,
		TerritoryID as short,
		ShipMethodID as short,
		ProductID as short,
		OrderQty as short,
		UnitPrice as double,
		UnitPriceDiscount as double,
		LineTotal as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Sales
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		PersonID as string,
		StoreID as string,
		TerritoryID as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		ModifiedDate as string,
		id_sk_customer as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Customerloaded
Customerloaded, Sales lookup(Customerloaded@CustomerID == Sales@CustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
